metadata.Title: CVE-2012-5197 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Certified (bionic) - medium.
metadata.Description:
Multiple unspecified vulnerabilities in Condor 7.6.x before 7.6.10 and 7.8.x before 7.8.4 have unknown impact and attack vectors related to "error checking of system calls."

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2012-5197` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

htcondor - 8.6.8~dfsg.1-2
libclassad8 - 8.6.8~dfsg.1-2
No subscription required

criterions.comment: condor package in bionic, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '8.6.8~dfsg.1-2').
